title: Silver elo looking for rank team or Duo partner to get out low elo.
body: Add me Boringah and let's work together in getting away from toxic and trolls players

replies.body: I will add you tonight, do u play top? I will add u to my ranked 5
I can play top. not my main but im happy to play anywhere except adc not good there
I added u. im b1 atm but I feel so much better.. toxic and afk ruins this game.. same as bad map awareness. need good players with me to push me further

> [{quoted}](name=ImtheAnimal,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gluVKvzg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-23T21:31:17.621+0000)
>
> I added u. im b1 atm but I feel so much better.. toxic and afk ruins this game.. same as bad map awareness. need good players with me to push me further

Classic bronze mentality. "I deserve challenger but my teams."
lol.. no I don't think challenger, but I def think im better than bronze. more towards gold I reckon
Thread title: carry me out of silver plz

add me:span.
keen to play some duo tonight so ill be on.
